content.raw:
LGTM! I left one minor comment. I also noticed that the card for the example system doesn't show up if the gui window is too small. It shows up when I maximize the window. Probably out of scope for this PR, but I thought I should mention it.
 ![Peek 2020-04-01 10-23.gif](data/bitbucket.org/repo/8zodKzn/images/3038792078-Peek_2020-04-01_10-23.gif)
content.html: LGTM! I left one minor comment. I also noticed that the card for the example system doesn't show up if the gui window is too small. It shows up when I maximize the window. Probably out of scope for this PR, but I thought I should mention it.
